sentence: Especially family concierge room
Pool side view and ocean cabana are great for relaxation
We were shown to our room and our luggage arrived quickly
Maria the beautiful little lady who cleaned our room I just wanted to take her home with me the sweetest lady ever
Beautiful beach beautiful view and sometimes bands playing on the beach at the neighboring resorts –
Great views great foods
Nice marble floors granite bathroom
We moved around and never had the same one and were able to enjoy some amazing views of the beach pool
We stayed in Royal Service but pyramid 5 is currently being remodeled so we stayed in a one bedroom ocean view suite in pyramid 4 which was beautiful
The rooms were very nice and clean the lobby was just gorgeous the scent that they pump in the air was a little overpowering at times but it was part of the atmosphere
The room while maybe a bit small was clean and well decorated
I would summarize our view on the hotel as Inconsistent
The hotel initially gave one of the worst rooms even after being asked prior to the trip of view rooms
Some of the staff in the restaurants gave attitude and were rude when asking for bottled water but other than that everyone was very pleasant
If you are traveling with kids I recommend splurging on the Family Concierge rooms
The tub looked kind of old but other than that it was beyond amazing
Upon check we were told something will be sent to up to our room for our Anniversary
There used to be snacks stocked in the in room fridge there was nothing also never restocked the soda and water I had to call for more and it took almost an hour to get it
Room service again basically no service
Food over all was good but not consistent and room service was great but sometimes it took a bit long
